name: Air Fryer Burgers
author: Louis Benson
summary: These juicy, scrumptious beef burgers are a great meal and save you time and energy using the versatility of the air fryer! This recipe is easily doubled.
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix beef, red onion, garlic, salt, pepper, Worcestershire, and English mustard together in a mixing bowl
Form patties by pressing a ball of ground beef with your hand and rounding the sides to your desired size
Cook burgers in the preheated air fryer until firm and no longer pink in the centers, about 10 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
